programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Owls (12-10, 5-4) swoop in on the Golden Hurricane (9-14, 3-7) in American Athletic Conference play. Florida Atlantic racked up a 102-70 home win over Tulsa last season in their first meeting in more than a decade. FAU won three of its last four.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Trojans take on the Eagles. Morehead State defeated Little Rock for the 2024 Ohio Valley Conference Tournament championship, and claimed a Jan. 9 verdict at the Jack Stephens Center. Jerone Morton (MORE) scored 17 points in that January victory.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Panthers are on the prowl for a season-series sweep of the Tar Heels. Pittsburgh has suffered back-to-back losses since taking care of North Carolina, 73-65 on Jan. 28. UNC's RJ Davis averaged 16 points across his past five games versus Pitt.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Panthers (15-9, 9-4 MVC) host the Redbirds (15-9, 7-6). Northern Iowa's 85-84 victory at Illinois State on Jan. 11 was its 11th in their last 12 meetings. Trey Campbell (UNI) shot 8-for-13 from 3-point range and finished with 30 points.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Pirates (12-11, 4-6 American) try to remain spotless against the Roadrunners (10-12, 4-6). East Carolina is 3-0 versus UTSA all-time after an 84-73 victory over the Roadrunners last season. RJ Felton (ECU) scored 16 points in that win.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: UC San Diego at UC Irvine
programme.desc: The Anteaters link up with the Tritons. UC Irvine sits atop the Big West at 10-1 following a third straight win Feb. 1 over UC Davis. Both Aniwaniwa Tait-Jones and Tyler McGhie are averaging over 21 points across UC San Diego's past six road games.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks (16-6, 7-4 Big 12) meet the Wildcats (11-11, 5-6) for a Sunflower Showdown. Kansas added to its record amount of wins against Kansas State with its 206th on Jan. 18, as Hunter Dickinson's 25 points paced an 84-74 Jayhawks victory.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Tigers (18-5, 10-2 ACC) face the No. 2 Blue Devils (20-2, 12-0). Duke boasts the nation's longest win streak at 16 games after an 83-54 drubbing of Syracuse on Feb. 5. Clemson's six-game run ended in a triple-overtime loss Jan. 4 to Georgia Tech.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 3 Crimson Tide (19-3, 8-1 SEC) roll into this matchup with the Razorbacks (14-8, 3-6). Alabama has won five of six meetings since 2020-21, taking down Arkansas 92-88 last season. The Crimson Tide are riding a five-game winning streak.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 13 Red Raiders (18-4, 9-2) and No. 20 Wildcats (16-6, 10-1) streak into this Big 12 clash at the McKale Center. Texas Tech boasts a seven-game win streak. Arizona has won five straight and 12 of its last 13. The loss came at Texas Tech 70-54.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Beavers look to spring another home shocker in West Coast Conference play when the Gaels visit. This is the first meeting between the schools since the 1968-1969 campaign. Oregon State already defeated WCC heavyweight Gonzaga at home this season.

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: Zora vive con su hija adolescente Tuesday, enferma terminal. Un día, se presenta ante ellas la misma Muerte, que adopta la forma física de un ave parlante. Comienza así una experiencia que cambiará la manera en que ambas perciben la vida.

programme.title: The Disaster Artist

programme.title: The Wave

programme.desc: Thackery worries that Dr. Levi Zinberg, a Jewish surgeon and inventor, will steal his spotlight; Bertie continues his courtship of Lucy while staving off his father's demands that he leave the Knick.
